mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO ASS_DEPRE_DETAIL_General (
group_id ,
hos_id ,
copy_code ,
change_no ,
ass_card_no ,
old_depre ,
change_depre ,
new_depre ,
note ,
) VALUES (
#{group_id} ,
#{hos_id} ,
#{copy_code} ,
#{change_no} ,
#{ass_card_no} ,
#{old_depre} ,
#{change_depre} ,
#{new_depre} ,
#{note}
)
mapper.select: SELECT group_id, hos_id, copy_code, change_no, ass_card_no, old_depre, change_depre, new_depre, note FROM ass_depre_detail_General WHERE group_id = #{group_id} and hos_id = #{hos_id} and copy_code = #{copy_code} and change_no = #{change_no} and ass_card_no = #{ass_card_no}
